title: Golf: a special kind of joy
creator_credit: Tom Hilderbrand and National Golf Foundation
brief_description: Part 1 of the Modern Golf Instruction series. Places importance on building a swing to suit each individual player. Looks at the role of each golf club in obtaining loft and length and demonstrates the use of each club group. The language of golf is discussed and the handicap system explained.
